articles.title: NASA tweaks Voyager 2's power supply to avoid another sensor shutdown - The Register
articles.description: By redirecting energy from probe's voltage regulator, NASA buys itself another three years
articles.content: NASA boffins seeking a way to postpone instrument shutdowns on the venerable Voyager spacecrafts have worked out a solution they say will get another three years of power to Voyager 2's five remainin… [+3497 chars]

articles.author: Anil Ganti
articles.title: Attractive Asus ROG Ally price leak spells doom for the Steam Deck - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: A new leak says the Asus ROG Ally handheld gaming console with an AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme APU could cost just US$699. It comes with 512 GB of storage, 16 GB RAM, a 120 Hz screen and Windows 11.
articles.content: Earlier this week, Asus confirmed it would announce the ROG Ally's price and availability on May 11. It also said its price would be "below US$1,000" for both variants. Now, Twitter leaker SnoopyTech… [+1423 chars]

articles.author: Richard Angle
articles.title: SpaceX completes its 25th Falcon 9 launch of 2023 with latest Starlink deployment - TESLARATI
articles.description: SpaceX completed its 25th Falcon 9 launch of 2023 thus far with its latest deployment of 46 Starlink satellites.
articles.content: SpaceX successfully launched Falcon 9 for the 25th time so far in 2023 with its latest deployment of Starlink satellites this morning. Luckily the weather held off, allowing the launch to finally be … [+2237 chars]
